amendment.description: To provide incentives for the Department of Defense to achieve a clean audit opinion on its financial statements.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2419 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2419 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Sanders to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184; text: CR S4195-4196) To provide incentives for the Department of Defense to achieve a clean audit opinion on its financial statements.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2419 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Sanders to Amendment SA 2301.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2419 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
